steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5b49r","text":"To purify GST-FAM134C, fuse the cytosol-exposed domain of FAM134C (250-466aa) to a N-terminal synthesize the gene GST-tag by Genscript and clone into a pGEX-4T1 vector. Plasmid is also available from Addgene. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"272ht","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
